Name: ALERT STAGE
Explanation: THE READINESS STATUS EXPRESSED AS AN INDICATION OF THE TIME SPECIFIED OR IMPLIED IN WHICH AN ENTITY IS TO RESPOND TO AN IMMEDIATE ORDER.

Name: AIRCRAFT ALERT CODE
Explanation: THE CODE FOR THE READINESS STATUS OF AN AIRCRAFT, EXPRESSED AS AN INDICATION OF THE TIME IMPLIED TO BE AIRBORNE AFTER THE LAUNCH ORDER IS RECEIVED.REFERENCE 1: COMAIRNORTH SUPPLAN 24600D CONSTANT EFFORT FOR THE NORTHERN REGION INTEGRATED AIR DEFENCE SYSTEM (NRIADS)
Version: REFERENCE 2: COMAIRSOUTH SUPPLAN 45600 "DECISIVE GUARDIAN" FOR THE SOUTHERN REGION INTEGRATED AIR DEFENCE SYSTEM (SRIADS).

Name: AIRCRAFT ALERT READINESS STATE
Explanation: THE ALERT READINESS STATE OF AN AIRCRAFT, RS01 THROUGH RS99. THE LOWER THE NUMBER, THE HIGHER THE READINESS.
